Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5115 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.14.11-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5115 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.14.11-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ansible is earlier than 2.14.11-1, affected by CVE-2023-5115
